title: Breaded sole fillets
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1 lemon, juiced', '80g dried breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 sole fillets (or other white fish)', '1 knob butter', 'lemon wedges, to serve']
